original_text:
Count Jokula
Play’n GO sta espandendo la sua popolare serie di slot Frutta Joker con una new entry da far rizzare i capelli, intitolata Count Jokula!  Tieni d’occhio il Joker Wild mentre trasforma i simboli del pipistrello sui rulli in icone vincenti e affronta il round Respins of Evil in cui è possibile assegnare un moltiplicatore fino a x20 e un massimo di 25 Respin!
Sarai abbastanza coraggioso da entrare nel castello del Conte Jokula?
Count Jokula Gioco base, simboli e funzione Shapeshifter
Count Jokula è una slot a 3 rulli con 5 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata minima disponibile per i giocatori è 0,05€ per giro e la puntata massima è di 100€ a round, con molte altre opzioni di scommessa. Count Jokula ha un RTP teorico del 96,22% e una capacità di vincita massima di 8.350x.
In termini di simboli, quello regolare più remunerativo del Conte Jokula è il Pipistrello, seguito dalla Spada e dal Calice. I simboli a pagamento basso cadono su prugne, uva, limoni e ciliegie. È presente anche un Joker Wild, che sostituisce tutte le icone a pagamento di valore alto e basso.
Sebbene Count Jokula abbia solo 3 rulli, Play’n GO è comunque riuscito a includere una funzione Shapeshifter durante il gioco base molto divertente.  Come funziona? Se il simbolo Pipistrello si ferma su uno qualsiasi dei rulli, può trasformarsi casualmente in un Joker Wild e formare una combinazione vincente.
Quando si attiva il round Respins of Evil?
Durante il gioco base, se si forma una combinazione vincente con il Joker Wild sul rullo centrale, si attiverà il round Respins of Evil ed  entrerà in gioco un misuratore moltiplicatore sopra il set di rulli, fino a un massimo di x20. Anche il simbolo Wild Joker sul rullo centrale diventerà appiccicoso e rimarrà nella sua posizione per tutta la durata dei 25 Respin disponibili.
Conte Jokula: il mio verdetto
Nonostante Halloween sia passato, i fornitori come Play’n GO hanno scelto di sfruttare al massimo questa festività prediligendo per questa slot online temi spettrali e un riferimento particolare al leggendario Conte Dracula.
Se ad una prima impressione il gameplay a 3 rulli e 5 payline risulti semplice, (come lo sono molte delle slot della serie Joker),  Count Jokula è potenzialmente sorprendente con un limite massimo di vincite pari a 8.350 volte la scommessa.
Nel complesso, Count Jokula è una slot divertente con cui celebrare la stagione di Halloween, indipendentemente dal periodo dell’anno, sia in modalità Demo che con soldi veri in uno dei casino con licenza AAMS-ADM presenti nel nostro catalogo.
 

Domande Frequenti 
Come si attivano i Respins of Evil della slot Count Jokula?

Si attivano quando un Joker/Jokula colpisce il rullo centrale aiutando a formare una combinazione vincente fino ad un massimo di 25 respins consecutivi con un  valore del moltiplicatore possibile pari a 20x.



Quanto vale l’RTP della slot vampiresca Conte Jokula?

Il Count Jokula ha un RTP è del 96,22%, che è un valore tipico di molti titoli di questo provider. In termini di varianza, questa video slot rientra nella fascia media.



Esiste una versione demo del Count Jokula?

Sì, la demo slot Count Jokula è disponibile qui su Slotjava. Insegui Respins e Joker Wilds su dispositivi desktop, mobili e/o tablet.

raw_translation.response:
Play'n GO is expanding its popular Fruit Joker slot series with a hair-raising new addition titled Count Jokula! Keep an eye out for the Joker Wild as it transforms bat symbols on the reels into winning icons and take on the Respins of Evil round where you can be awarded a multiplier of up to x20 and up to 25 respins! Are you brave enough to enter Count Jokula's castle? 

Count Jokula features a 3-reel, 5 fixed payline slot game. The minimum bet available for players is €0.05 per spin and the maximum bet is €100 per round, with many other betting options available. Count Jokula has a theoretical RTP of 96.22% and a maximum win potential of 8,350x.

In terms of symbols, the most rewarding regular symbol for Count Jokula is the Bat followed by the Sword and Chalice. Lower paying symbols include Plums, Grapes, Lemons, and Cherries. Also present is a Joker Wild, which replaces all high and low paying icons.

Although Count Jokula only has 3 reels, Play'n GO has still managed to include a fun Shapeshifter feature during gameplay. How does it work? If the Bat symbol stops on any of the reels, it can randomly transform into a Joker Wild and form a winning combination. 

When is the Respins of Evil round activated? During gameplay, if a winning combination is formed with the Joker Wild on the middle reel, the Respins of Evil round will be activated, and a multiplier meter above the set of reels will come into play, up to a maximum of x20. The Joker Wild symbol on the middle reel will also become sticky and remain in its position for the duration of the 25 available respins.

Overall, Count Jokula is a fun slot game to celebrate the Halloween season, regardless of the time of year, in Demo mode or with real money at one of the AAMS-ADM licensed casinos featured in our catalog. 

Frequently asked questions:
- How do I activate the Respins of Evil feature in the Count Jokula slot?
The feature is activated when a Joker/Jokula hits the middle reel, helping to form a winning combination for up to 25 consecutive respins with a possible multiplier value of 20x.

- What is the RTP of the vampire-themed Count Jokula slot?
Count Jokula has a typical RTP of 96.22%, which is a typical value for many titles from this provider. In terms of variance, this video slot falls into the medium range.

- Is there a demo version of Count Jokula?
Yes, the Count Jokula demo slot is available here on Slotjava. Chase respins and Joker Wilds on desktop, mobile, and/or tablet devices.

Review:
 
Gameplay and Mechanics

Count Jokula is a three-reel, five-payline slot game with a minimum bet of €0.05 and a maximum bet of €100 per spin. The game features a Shapeshifter mechanic where the bat symbol can randomly transform into a Joker Wild and form a winning combination. The Respins of Evil feature is triggered during the base game when a winning combination is formed with the Joker Wild on the center reel, and offers up to 25 consecutive respins with a multiplier value of up to 20x.

Bonus Features

Count Jokula's bonus features include the Joker Wild symbol, which replaces all high and low-paying icons, and the Respins of Evil round, which is activated when the Joker Wild forms a winning combination in the center reel during the base game. This feature offers up to a maximum of 25 consecutive respins with a multiplier value of up to 20x.

Graphics and Sound Effects

Count Jokula features high-quality graphics and animations that are sure to give players a spooky thrill. The game's symbols are composed of bats, swords, chalices, plums, grapes, lemons, and cherries. The game's audio effects also add to the overall eerie atmosphere of the game, with creepy background noises and dramatic sound effects during bonus features.

Theme and Storyline

Count Jokula is based on the legendary Count Dracula and features a spooky theme that is perfect for Halloween. The game's symbols, graphics, and sound effects all contribute to creating a mysterious and eerie atmosphere that is sure to please fans of horror movies and books.

Payout Potential

Count Jokula has a theoretical RTP of 96.22% and a maximum win potential of 8,350x. This makes the game a medium variance slot with plenty of opportunities for players to earn big wins through the Shapeshifter and Respins of Evil features. The game is suitable for both low and high rollers, with plenty of betting options available.

Review: Play'n GO is expanding its popular Fruit Joker slot series with a hair-raising new entry titled Count Jokula! Are you brave enough to enter Count Jokula's castle?

Count Jokula's base game consists of three reels with five fixed paylines. The minimum bet per spin is €0.05, while the maximum is €100 per round, with many other betting options available. Count Jokula has a theoretical RTP of 96.22% and a maximum win potential of 8,350x.

In terms of symbols, the most rewarding regular symbol is the bat, followed by the sword and chalice. Low-paying symbols include plums, grapes, lemons, and cherries. There's also a Joker Wild, which replaces all high and low-paying icons.

Despite having only three reels, Play'n GO has managed to include a fun Shapeshifter feature during the base game. How does it work? If the bat symbol stops on any of the reels, it can randomly transform into a Joker Wild and form a winning combination.

When is the Respins of Evil round activated? During the base game, if a winning combination is formed with the Joker Wild on the center reel, the Respins of Evil round will be activated, and a multiplier meter above the reels will come into play, up to a maximum of x20. The Joker Wild symbol on the center reel will also become sticky and remain in place for the entire duration of the 25 available Respins.

My verdict on Count Jokula: Despite Halloween being over, providers like Play'n GO have chosen to make the most out of this holiday by favoring spooky themes and a particular reference to the legendary Count Dracula for this online slot.
